text:
vermontpublic.org
website
Vermont
Hospital closures, cuts major issue at Northeast Kingdom lobbying day at the Statehouse
By Vermont Public,1 hours ago
Dozens of residents from the Northeast Kingdom were at the Statehouse Thursday hoping to keep the needs of Vermont’s most rural region front and center as lawmakers debate policy in Montpelier. Sporting stickers that read “NEK Strong” and holding brightly colored posters, speakers and participants highlighted the resilience of...
